hero.name: Aakib Ansari
hero.description: Dynamic web developer and digital marketer with expertise in modern web technologies, SEO, and social media advertising.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building responsive and dynamic websites using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and TypeScript.

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: Implementing effective SEO strategies and managing social media campaigns for better online presence.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Creating intuitive and user-friendly interfaces with modern design principles and tools.

projects.title: Job Hub Website
projects.description: A job listing and career-focused platform where users can browse jobs, apply, and read career-related blogs.

projects.description: A next-gen ecommerce site with a modern design, featuring electronics and mobile gadgets for seamless online shopping.

projects.description: An AI image generator web app that allows users to create custom images based on text prompts using modern AI APIs.

projects.title: Order Management
projects.description: A cross-platform mobile app for managing product orders, built with Expo and React Native. It allows users to track, update, and manage orders in real-time with a clean and responsive UI.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A sleek and responsive personal portfolio to showcase skills, projects, and achievements.

projects.title: Mobile Store Website
projects.description: An online store for mobile phones with product listings, cart, and order integration.
